Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN LOCAL GOVERNMENTS

Title: Provides an award to the Port of Oswego Authority from the funds appropriated under the Lake Ontario-St. Lawrence Seaway flood recovery grant program
Summary: Provides an award of funds needed to meet the matching requirements for FEMA funds not to exceed $2,250,000 to the Port of Oswego Authority from the funds appropriated under the Lake Ontario-St. Lawrence Seaway flood recovery grant program, provided there are sufficient funds remaining from the original amounts allocated for the program.
ActClause: AN ACT to provide an award to the Port of Oswego Authority from the funds appropriated under the Lake Ontario-St. Lawrence Seaway flood recovery grant program
